page.title: 16EDUCATION (PART 1)
page.content: ALL EDUCATION HERE IS PROVIDED IN STATE SCHOOLS ONLY.PRIVATE EDUCATION, HAS TO BE SOUGHT OUTSIDE THE RHONDDA. ALL THE{PRIMARY SCHOOLS}ARE VERY OLD. THE 6 PRIMARY SCHOOLS IN THE BLOCK HAVE BETWEEN THEM{1100 PUPILS,34 {STAFF}.CHILDREN START PRIMARY SCHOOL AT THE AGE OF 3 AND LEAVE AT 11. YNYSWEN INFANTS CATERS FOR PHYSICALLY HANDICAPPED CHILDREN WHO INTEGRATE FOR MOST OF THE DAY.PENYRENGLYN JUNIOR HAS 2 SPECIAL CLASSES FOR CHILDREN WITH DIFFICULTIES,AND A PERMANENT REMEDIAL READING TEACHER.THE ONLY TIME THESE SCHOOLS MEET IS AT THEIR ANNUAL SPORTS.NUMBERS HAVE DECREASED IN A SCHOOLS OVER THE LAST 36 YEARS THE EXCEPTION BEING YNYSWEN WELSH LANGUAGE SCHOOL,WHICH OPENED IN 1950 WITH 38 PUPILS AND BY 1984 HAD 212.
